text: @realDonaldTrump @robertjeffress @VP USA has 4.5% of the global population but 25% of the COVID-19 DEATHS.  Why? GROSSLY INCOMPETENT PRESIDENT.  Goes and plays golf and focuses on statues of Confederate Slave Owners while AMERICANS die from the pandemic.  DJT is unfit to lead this country.  Call the movers. https://t.co/0t2nDF8K3z
